009package imagingbook.common.geometry.circle;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.isZero;
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013import static java.lang.Math.sqrt;
014
015import java.util.Locale;
016
017/**
018 * Represents an algebraic circle of the form
019 * A * (x^2 + y^2) + B * x + C * y + D = 0.
020 * TODO: add implementation of Curve2d
021 * 
022 * @author WB
023 *
024 */
025public class AlgebraicCircle  implements Circle {
026
027        private final double A, B, C, D;
028        
029        public AlgebraicCircle(double A, double B, double C, double D) {
030                if (isZero(A) || sqr(B) + sqr(C) - 4 * A * D < 0) {
031                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("illegal circle parameters");
032                }
033                this.A = A;
034                this.B = B;
035                this.C = C;
036                this.D = D;
037        }
038        
039        public AlgebraicCircle(double[] p) {
040                this(p[0], p[1], p[2], p[3]);
041        }
042        
043        public static AlgebraicCircle from(GeometricCircle gc) {
044                double A = 1 / (2 * gc.getR());
045                double B = -2 * A * gc.getXc();
046                double C = -2 * A * gc.getYc();
047                double D = (sqr(B) + sqr(C) - 1) / (4 * A);
048                return new AlgebraicCircle(A, B, C, D);
049        }
050        
051        @Override
052        public double[] getParameters() {
053                return new double[] {A, B, C, D};
054        }
055        
056        public AlgebraicCircle normalize() {
057                double s = sqrt(sqr(B) + sqr(C) - 4 * A * D);
058                System.out.println("s = " + s);
059                return new AlgebraicCircle(s*A, s*B, s*C, s*D);
060        }
061        
062        @Override
063        public String toString() {
064                return String.format(Locale.US, "%s [A=%f, B=%f, C=%f, D=%f]", 
065                                AlgebraicCircle.class.getSimpleName(), A, B, C, D);
066        }
067        
068        // ------------------------------------------------------------------
069        
070        public static void main(String[] args) {
071                
072                GeometricCircle gc1 = new GeometricCircle(200, -300, 777);
073                System.out.println(gc1.toString());
074                
075                AlgebraicCircle ac1 = AlgebraicCircle.from(gc1);
076                System.out.println(ac1.toString());
077                
078                GeometricCircle gc2 = GeometricCircle.from(ac1);
079                System.out.println(gc2.toString());
080                
081                AlgebraicCircle ac2 = ac1.normalize();
082                System.out.println(ac2.toString());
083                
084                GeometricCircle gc3 = GeometricCircle.from(ac2);
085                System.out.println(gc3.toString());
086                
087        }
088        
089        
090}
